controlBits.name: Input Enable 7-Segment Display
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the 7-Segment Display (the data will be displayed immediately)

controlBits.name: Output Enable ALU
controlBits.description: Enables outputting the ALU-result to the bus

controlBits.name: ALU Source
controlBits.description: Sets the source of the ALU: 0 = arithmetic operation, 1 = bitwise operation

controlBits.name: ALU Carry In
controlBits.description: Sets the Carry-In Bit for the adders of the ALU

controlBits.name: ALU Arithmetic Operation
controlBits.description:
Sets the arithmetic operation of the ALU:
0 = ADD
1 = SUB

controlBits.name: ALU Bitwise Operation
controlBits.description:
Sets the bitwise operation of the ALU:
000 = AND
001 = OR
010 = XOR
011 = NOT
100 = SLR
101 = SAR
110 = ROR
111 = ROL

controlBits.name: Input Enable A-Register
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the A-Register

controlBits.name: Output Enable A-Register
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the A-Register to the bus

controlBits.name: Input Enable B-Register
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the B-Register

controlBits.name: Output Enable B-Register
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the B-Register to the bus

controlBits.name: Input Enable Buffer-Register
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the Buffer-Register

controlBits.name: Output Enable Buffer-Register
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the Buffer-Register to the bus

controlBits.name: Reset Step Counter
controlBits.description: Resets the steps counter to zero. This microinstruction is executed at the end of each instruction to reduce the number of microsteps per instruction.

controlBits.name: Input Enable Flags-Register
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the Flags-Register

controlBits.name: Output Enable Flags-Register
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the Flags-Register to the bus

controlBits.name: Input Enable Instruction-Register
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the Instruction-Register

controlBits.name: Output Enable Instruction-Register
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the Instruction-Register to the bus

controlBits.name: LCD Read/Write
controlBits.description: //TODO

controlBits.name: LCD Register Select
controlBits.description: Chooses between the instruction register (0) and the data register (1) of the LCD

controlBits.name: LCD Enable Input
controlBits.description: Writes the data that is currently present at the data pins to the internal selected register

controlBits.name: Input Enable Memory-Address-Register Low
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the low byte of the MAR

controlBits.name: Output Enable Memory-Address-Register Low
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the high byte of the MAR

controlBits.name: Memory Write Enable
controlBits.description: Enables writing to RAM

controlBits.name: Memory Enable Input/Output
controlBits.description: Enables data flow between memory and bus (direction depends on MEM_WE)

controlBits.name: Increment Program Counter
controlBits.description: Increments the PC in order to fetch the next opcode or operand

controlBits.name: Input Enable Program Counter Low
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the low byte of the PC

controlBits.name: Output Enable Program Counter Low
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the low byte of the PC to the bus

controlBits.name: Input Enable Program Counter High
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the high byte of the PC

controlBits.name: Output Enable Program Counter High
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the high byte of the PC to the bus

controlBits.name: Input Enable Stack Pointer Low
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the low byte of the SP

controlBits.name: Output Enable Stack Pointer Low
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the low byte of the SP to the bus

controlBits.name: Input Enable Stack Pointer High
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the high byte of the SP

controlBits.name: Output Enable Stack Pointer High
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the high byte of the SP to the bus

controlBits.name: Input Enable TMP-Register
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the TMP-Register

controlBits.name: Output Enable TMP-Register
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the TMP-Register to the bus

controlBits.name: Input Enable X-Register
controlBits.description: Enables loading data from the bus to the X-Register

controlBits.name: Output Enable X-Register
controlBits.description: Enables outputting data from the X-Register to the bus

controlBits.name: Increment X-Register
controlBits.description: Increments the X-Register if DEC_X is low

controlBits.name: Decrement X-Register
controlBits.description: Decrements the X-Register if INC_X is low
